topic: 11. Which of these are objectives of Team Software Process?
options: Allow better time management by highly trained professionals
Show managers how to reduce costs and sustain quality
topic_cn: 11. 以下哪些是团队软件过程（Team Software Process, TSP）的目标？
options_cn: 让高素质的专业人员更好地进行时间管理
构建自我管理的软件团队
向管理者展示如何降低成本并保持质量
